text:
This is a most peculiar statement by @AmitShah ji:  https://t.co/OxFdjbksz0
Does the home minister think we run a parallel government whenever they fail to function? Would they like to hand over the keys to the Opposition to see how much more we can do in their place?

urls.title: Amit Shah: On Corona, we may have fallen short (but) what did Opposition do?
urls.description: Saying that the Narendra Modi government had announced a package of Rs 1,70,000 crore, Amit Shah asked the Opposition what it had done. Shah was addressing a virtual rally for Odisha from New Delhi.
